name: Hamster Evolution Party
description:
When I was just a little hamster, I asked my mother, 'What will I be? 'Will I be pretty? 'Will I be rich?'...

The journey of heart of a happy and cute little hamster, an autobiography-style simulation game!

- Witness the growing story of a schizophrenic(?) little hamster!

- Help you increase working motivation, relieve your working pressure!

- Lead you understand the opinions about living from a hamster.

- Leverage the hamster as a mirror to introspect your life...

- A lucid dream is any dream in which one is aware that one is dreaming.

...what will be will be
